Raimann was able to practice on a limited basis on Saturday for the first time all week, with an arm brace on his injured […]

items.title: Philip Rivers feels ‘a week better,’ but that must translate into Colts wins
items.summary: INDIANAPOLIS – After a frenetic week of transitioning from high school coach to the NFL’s oldest player, Philip Rivers has settled back into the daily grind that used to dictate his life for 17 seasons. Team meetings, positional meetings, work in the weight room, more meetings, walkthroughs and practices. And taking inventory of his 44-year-old [...]
